channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8328647] TestGarbageCollectorMXBean.java fails with C1-only and -Xcomp
item.description:
Test
gc/x/TestGarbageCollectorMXBean.java
fails with
-Xcomp -ea -esa -XX:CompileThreshold=100 -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:TieredStopAtLevel=1/2/3

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Fix request [17u]

I backport this for parity with 17.0.13-oracle.
No risk, only tests change.
Test pass. SAP nightly testing passed.

Fix request [21u]

I backport this for parity with 21.0.5-oracle.
No risk, only a test change.
Clean backport.
Test pass. SAP nightly testing passed.

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk17u-dev/pull/2629
Date: 2024-06-24 09:34:45 +0000

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/784
Date: 2024-06-24 09:34:32 +0000

Changeset: bdd9438b
Author: Stefan Karlsson <stefank@openjdk.org>
Date: 2024-04-03 08:58:41 +0000
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/commit/bdd9438b453fedf9b8181ad2615640168638677d

A pull request was submitted for review.
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk/pull/18421
Date: 2024-03-21 07:55:22 +0000
The test is not written to handle compiler flags that will fill up the code cache. This should be easy to fix by requiring that the test is not run with Xcomp.
